reviews.review_content:
In general, the Ear Training sequence is a joke. Lu is sweet, and a lot smarter and more talented than you, but the class is a bit of a joke. As long as you attend and don't flip her off everytime she wakes you up from your nap, you'll do fine. Just put a little, miniscule effort into showing up and you don't need to worry.
Workload:
she asks you to prepare songs... just write the sol-feg out below and you'll be fine.
